about_the_game:
Eat as much cocaine as you can before the police arrive to minimize your losses, then high-tail it until you can lose the cops. Avoid any obstacles in the road by swerving left or right, then use boosts or eat some of your cocaine to move faster. If you slow down too much then the police will bust you! Thanks to your knowledge of arithmetic, you know that only 3 other ostriches will fit in the police cruiser, so you only have to outrun everyone else.

Once everyone else is busted, you’ll be running so fast that you leave the atmosphere and land on the moon! Nobody is going to bust a drug lord on the moon, since the moon is probably already made of cocaine. There’s no way to stop you, since that is where all the cocaine gets sent when they take it anyway!

If you find that the other dealers in town are a little too rational, you can utilize IRC technology in order to tap in to a vast network of drug dealers that have far less rationality at their disposal in their pursuits.

content_descriptors.notes: ostriches doing enough cocaine to outrun the police and achieve space flight to wind up on the moon

detailed_description:
Eat as much cocaine as you can before the police arrive to minimize your losses, then high-tail it until you can lose the cops. Avoid any obstacles in the road by swerving left or right, then use boosts or eat some of your cocaine to move faster. If you slow down too much then the police will bust you! Thanks to your knowledge of arithmetic, you know that only 3 other ostriches will fit in the police cruiser, so you only have to outrun everyone else.

Once everyone else is busted, you’ll be running so fast that you leave the atmosphere and land on the moon! Nobody is going to bust a drug lord on the moon, since the moon is probably already made of cocaine. There’s no way to stop you, since that is where all the cocaine gets sent when they take it anyway!

If you find that the other dealers in town are a little too rational, you can utilize IRC technology in order to tap in to a vast network of drug dealers that have far less rationality at their disposal in their pursuits.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 2.41GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB Integrated VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.80GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: If you want

Atos criminosos
Linguagem imprópria
Drogas ilícitas

short_description: Can you smell that? It’s cocaine. The most desirable drug to any well respected business Ostrich. That’s why your gang of like-minded drug-enthused Ostrich companions decided to trade drugs, money, and personal exchanges in the middle of a street. That is, until you got word that the police would soon arrive to bust everything up
